# Code of Conduct

## Our Standard

We expect all participants to:
- Be respectful and constructive.
- Focus on technical issues and evidence.
- Avoid harassment, threats, hate speech, or personal attacks.

## Unacceptable Behavior

- Harassment or intimidation.
- Doxxing or sharing private information.
- Spam, trolling, or intentionally disruptive behavior.
- Any abusive or discriminatory language.

## Enforcement

Maintainers may edit, remove, lock, or reject content that violates this policy and may restrict participation when needed.

## Reporting

Report conduct concerns privately to repository maintainers.
